heroes.name: Ironman
heroes.description: Tony Stark, a billionaire genius, uses his advanced Iron Man suit to protect the world with unparalleled intelligence.

heroes.name: Thor
heroes.description: Thor, the mighty God of Thunder, wields his hammer Mjolnir to defend the Nine Realms with divine strength and honor.

heroes.name: Black Widow
heroes.description: Natasha Romanoff, the Black Widow, combines exceptional espionage and combat skills to face any threat with bravery.
